text.html: Here is a quote from my current favorite binge show and episode Halt and Catch Fire - Season 1 Ep 9 - Up Helly Aa.

quote.html:
(Joe) I'm sick of hearing about IBM. IBM scraps more projects in a day than any of us attempt in a year.

What we did was harder. We took one idea all the way.

And it cost us. It cost us people.

But the evidence of that cost is there.

(Gordon) It's in the damn metal.
quote.text: (Joe) I'm sick of hearing about IBM. IBM scraps more projects in a day than any of us attempt in a year.  What we did was harder. We took one idea all the way.  And it cost us. It cost us people. But the evidence of that cost is there.  (Gordon) It's in the damn metal.
